system: Optech Titan channel 1 (1550nm, 3.5 degrees forward looking) with a Northrup Grumman LN200

uncertainties.name: std_scan_angle
uncertainties.source: not found, using angular resolution of 0.001 deg from Optech 3100 shown in Glennie's 2007 JAG paper

uncertainties.name: std_sensor_xy
uncertainties.source: LN200 datasheet, airborne PP RMS = 0.01 meters

uncertainties.name: std_sensor_z
uncertainties.source: LN200 datasheet, airborne PP RMS = 0.02 meters

uncertainties.name: std_bore_rollpitch
uncertainties.source: unknown, using 0.001 degrees from Table 2 in Glennie's 2007 JAG paper

uncertainties.name: std_bore_yaw
uncertainties.source: unknown, using 0.004 degrees from Table 2 in Glennie's 2007 JAG paper

uncertainties.name: std_lever_xyz
uncertainties.source: unknown, using conservative etimate of 2cm from Glennie's 2007 JAG paper

uncertainties.name: beam_divergence
uncertainties.source: Titan datasheet: 0.35 mrad at 1/e * sqrt(2) = 0.49 mrad at 1/e^2
